Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who successfully complete the entire journey from initial contact to post-purchase follow-up.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: (Number of Customers Completing the Journey / Total Number of Customers Targeted) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of mapping the customer journey, based on how well the map reflects actual customer experiences and touchpoints.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Journey Maps / Total Number of Journey Maps) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.KPIS: Customer satisfaction at key journey touchpoints.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction levels of customers at specific stages or touchpoints in their journey, measured through surveys or feedback.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score at Key Touchpoints in the Customer Journey

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.KPIS: Customer retention rate post journey mapping improvements.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers retained after implementing improvements based on customer journey mapping.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: (Number of Customers Retained / Total Number of Customers After Improvements) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.KPIS: Conversion rate from one journey stage to another.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who move from one stage of the customer journey to the next, such as from interest to purchase.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: (Number of Conversions from One Stage to Another / Total Number of Customers at Previous Stage) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to map out customer journeys, including research, analysis, and documentation expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: Total Cost of Customer Journey Mapping / Total Number of Mapped Customer Journeys

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: How often customer journey maps are reviewed and updated to reflect changes in customer behavior or business processes.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: Total Number of Journey Map Updates / Total Time Period

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.KPIS: Impact on customer lifetime value (CLV) from journey mapping.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.EXPLANATION: Measure of how improvements from customer journey mapping affect the long-term value a customer brings to the company.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience+.FORMULA: (CLV After Journey Mapping - CLV Before Journey Mapping) / CLV Before Journey Mapping * 100
